name: Personal Website
description: Website that serves both as a blog and portfolio. Created using react and gatsby

name: Emourge
description: A Discord bot to count emojis in messages send in a server and output the lowest frequency of emojis

name: Papercups
description: A P2P chat and file transfer program

name: scrapddit
description: A CLI which retrieves reddit posts from a subreddit or popular feed using Reddit API. Created using JavaScript.

name: Programmer News Bot
description: A Telegram bot which retrieves top posts from Hacker News and sends it to user at specified intervals, made in Javascript.

name: Hacker News Wrapper
description: A wrapper around Hacker News API to use in the Programmer News Bot project, made using Javascript.

name: birdtorrent_rs
description: (Discontinued) Bittorent implementation (bittorent client) made using Rust.
